translated: Verses of the Elder Nuns🔽The Group of Two’s First Section

original: yathā buddhena desitā.🔽Diṭṭho hi me so bhagavā,🔽antimoyaṁ samussayo;
analyzed: yathā buddhena desitā  diṭṭhaḥ hi me saḥ bhagavā  antimaḥ iyam samussayaḥ
translated: as taught by the Awakened One.🔽I have seen that Blessed One,🔽this is my last embodiment:
The cycle of birth is ended:

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ jentā therī gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam jentā therī gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus have I heard: This was said by the Elder Nun Jentā.
